popup.bankstorage.unlinked: This Bank Link not linked to a Bank. Craft one to link it instead.
tooltip.bankstorage.pickupmode.no_pickup: Items will not get picked or inserted
tooltip.bankstorage.pickupmode.pickup_al: All Items will get picked or inserted
tooltip.bankstorage.pickupmode.filtered: Only items already contained will get picked or inserted
title.bankstorage.sortmode.name: Sort
tooltip.bankstorage.sortmode.name: Sort by item name
admin_restore_bank.bankstorage.unknown_p: Cannot find the player to give the item to
emi.info.bankstorage.tips:
§nPickup modes§r
Pickup all: All items picked up will automatically go into the Bank.
Filtered pickup: Only filtered items will only go into Banks.
Void overflow: Overflow will be voided.

§nBuild modes§r
Build directly from the Bank.
Scroll while crouching to choose block.
Randomized build mode: Blocks get chosen randomly.
Right click which crouching to change build mode.

§nSlot filtering§r
Alt-click to set slot filter.

§nBank Dock§r
Right click with the Bank to dock it.
Right click while crouching to pick up the Bank.

§nBank Link§r
Link to another Bank to access the contents in multiple places at the same time.
